mean_cn: n.徽章；象征；标记；  vt.给……做标记；授予……徽章
mean_en: a small piece of metal or plastic, with a design or words on it, that a person wears to show that they belong to an organization, support something, have achieved something, have a particular rank, etc.
sentence: The boy received a badge for his good work, and pinned it on his coat.
sentence_trans: 小男孩因为出色的成绩得到了奖章，并将它别在了自己的外套上。
